content.html: I honestly don't know what to do about Twitter. I find him and his fan club absolutely repugnant. I don't want to support him in any way. But Twitter is how I've made many of my friends as an adult, how I've found multiple jobs, and is pretty essential to my life. Fuck.
content.value:
I honestly don't know what to do about Twitter.

I find him and his fan club absolutely repugnant. I don't want to support him in any way.

But Twitter is how I've made many of my friends as an adult, how I've found multiple jobs, and is pretty essential to my life.

Fuck.
